<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->
# CaseMatch Node Formatting

Represents a `case` statement used for pattern matching (for regular `case` see `Case` node)
<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
case foo
in [1, 2] then true
in *foo then nil
else
  "bar"
end
```

After:

```ruby
case foo
in [1, 2] then true
in *foo then nil
else "bar"
end
```
